• Angular 2 Fusiontime XT

Angular 2 FusionTime XT

Simple Angular 2 Module for FusionTime JavaScript Charting Library.
  • Home
  • Getting Started
  • Dashboard
  • Demos

Features

  • Add a chart using simple component
  • Easy to use data passing

Community

  • Github Repo
  • Issues

Support

Simply open up a github issue with your question/bug report/suggestion.

QuickStart

Step 1: Import fusiontime module into your app.module.ts


import { FusiontimeModule } from './fusiontime/fusiontime.module';
@NgModule({
  declarations: [
    AppComponent
  ],
  imports: [
    RouterModule.forRoot(appRoutes),
    BrowserModule,
    FormsModule,
    FusiontimeModule
  ],
  providers: [],
  bootstrap: [AppComponent]
})
export class AppModule {
  constructor() {

  }
}

Step 2: Use fusiontime component into target HTML element

<fusiontime [dataSource]="dataSource" [width]="width" [height]="height"></fusiontime>

Step 3: Provide details

You need to pass height , width and dataSource.


  import {
    Component,
    OnInit
  } from '@angular/core';

  @Component({
    selector: 'app-mobile',
    templateUrl: './mobile.component.html',
    styleUrls: ['./mobile.component.css']
  })
  export class MobileComponent implements OnInit {
    width = "850";
    height = "450";
    dataSource = {};

    ngOnInit() {
      this.dataSource = { };
    }
  }

Licensing

Angular 2 FusionTime is open-source and distributed under the terms of the MIT/X11 License. You will still need to download and include FusionCharts in your page. This project provides no direct functionality. You can Download an evaluation. You will still need to purchase a FusionCharts license to use in a commercial environment (FusionCharts is free for non-commercial and personal use) .
